Class QuestionBank

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.session.QuestionBank
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthorConstants, TopicQSetConstants

    public class QuestionBank
extends Object
implements TopicQSetConstants
    Initiates an authoring session.

        Returns:
        the new topic's ID number
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem writing to the database
        InvalidOpException - if the author doesn't have authority to add a topic

        description of the question set
        Throws:

      • setQSetDescr

        public void setQSetDescr(int topicIndex,
                         int index,
                         QSetDescr newQSetDescr)
                  throws InvalidOpException,
                         ParameterException,
                         DBException
        Modifies the description of a question set in a topic.
        Parameters:
        topicIndex - 1-based serial number of the topic
        index - 1-based serial number of the question set
        newQSetDescr - new description of the question set
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem writing to the database
        InvalidOpException - if the author doesn't have authority to modify the question set or add a topic
        ParameterException - if the serial number is out of range

      • deleteQSet

        public void deleteQSet(int topicIndex,
                       int index)
                throws ParameterException,
                       DBException
        Deletes a question set from a topic. Called only if the question set contains no questions.
        Parameters:
        topicIndex - 1-based serial number of the topic
        index - 1-based serial number of the question set
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem writing to the database
        ParameterException - if the serial numbers are out of range

        Parameters:
        topicIndex - 1-based serial number of the topic
        newQSetDescr - new description of the question set
        Returns:
        unique ID number of the new question set
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem writing to the database
        ParameterException - if the serial number is out of range

        public String exportQuestionBank(String filename)
                          throws DBException
        Export all topics, question sets, and questions to a zip file.
        Parameters:
        filename - location and name of the file in which the exported questions will be stored
        Returns:
        name of the zip file
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database

      • toXML

        private List<String> toXML()
                    throws DBException
        Convert all topics, question sets, and questions to XML.
        Returns:
        list where the first member is XML, remaining are file names of images
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database

      • importTopics

        public String importTopics(String zipFilename)
                    throws FileFormatException,
                           InvalidOpException,
                           ParserException,
                           DBException
        Import topics, etc. from a zipped file, saving images to disk.
        Parameters:
        zipFilename - name and location of zip file containing the questions
        Returns:
        how the import process went
        Throws:
        FileFormatException - if the file can't be found
        DBException - if there's a problem writing to the database
        ParserException - if the XML cannot be parsed
        InvalidOpException - if the author doesn't have authority to add a topic

      • parseXML

        public String parseXML(NodeList nodeList)
                throws ParserException,
                       InvalidOpException,
                       DBException
        Parse questions XML, saving them in entirely new topics.
        Parameters:
        nodeList - nodes obtained from the XML
        Returns:
        how the import process went
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem writing to the database
        ParserException - if the XML cannot be parsed
        InvalidOpException - if the author doesn't have authority to add a topic
